content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Good afternoon, Baihu Li. Thank you for coming to see my apartment. As a landlord, I am looking to rent out this 25 square meter apartment for the highest possible price. May I ask what is your budget for renting in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 150 Euros per month. Can you give me a rental price for this apartment?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for letting me know your budget, Baihu Li. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would estimate a rental price of 180 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider a lower price if it is within your budget. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can agree to the price of 150 Euros per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I agree to the price of 150 Euros per month, Baihu Li. Thank you for choosing my apartment for your rental needs. I am looking forward to having you as my tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
